topic.title: Library of includes
topic.chunk: %product% is currently in Early Access, which means it may be not reliable, work not as intended, and contain errors. Any use of the EAP product is at your own risk.
Your feedback is very welcome in our issue tracker or at qodana-support@jetbrains.com.
By using %product%, you agree to the JetBrains EAP user agreement and JetBrains privacy policy.

Running analysis locally is a resource-intensive operation. If you experience issues, consider increasing the Docker Desktop runtime memory limit, which by default is set to 2 GB. See the Docker Desktop documentation for Windows and Mac.
